title: Riot you lost your way, you can't make awesome champions anymore.
body:
This upcoming champ looks so autistic and boring. {{champion:223}} and {{champion:432}} are already some of the most epic fails I've ever seen in a video game, it seems more epic fails will join them soon.

The last two awesome champions you made were {{champion:268}} and {{champion:157}} .

You have lost your way, rip.
